text: Update From Editor Peter Sciretta : The following post was published on February 7th 2013 after we first learned that Disney was developing a Star Wars spin - off standalone film that would follow a young Han Solo, set between Episode III : Revenge of the Sith and Episode IV : A New Hope. Now that it has been confirmed that a Star Wars Anthology film following a young Han Solo will be directed by Lego Movie directors Phil Lord and Chris Miller for a Summer 2018 release, I thought this might be worth republishing. What would a Han Solo standalone original movie be about?
